net.viktorc.detroid.framework.engine

Class MagicsConfig

  • Object
    • MagicsConfig

  • public class MagicsConfig
extends Object
    A singleton class for reading and writing magic numbers and magic shifts for sliding pieces on specific squares.
    Author:
    Viktor

      • getRookMagics

        public Map.Entry<Long,Byte> getRookMagics(int sqrInd)
        Parameters:
        sqrInd - The square index.
        Returns:
        A key-value pair containing the magic number and the magic shift for a rook on the specified square.

      • setRookMagics

        sqrInd - The square index.
        Returns:

      • load

        public void load()
          throws IOException
        It loads the key-values from the properties file if they are not yet loaded.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the properties file cannot be read.

      • reload

        public void reload()
            throws IOException
        It reloads the key-values from the properties file whether they have been loaded before or not.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the properties file cannot be read.

      • save

        public void save()
          throws IOException
        It saves the key-values of the instance to the properties file.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the properties file cannot be written to.
